mapper.insert: insert into tab_notice(title, content, send_userName, send_person, send_role, send_time,rec_userName,rec_person,rec_role, msg_type, guid) values(#{title},#{content},#{send_userName},#{send_person},#{send_role},#{send_time},#{rec_userName},(select teacher_name from teacher where teacher_userName=#{rec_userName}),#{rec_role},#{msg_type},#{guid})
mapper.update: update student set student_state='迁出',out_date=#{1}, student_remark=#{2} where student_id=#{0}
mapper.select: select dorm_id from student_dorm where student_id=#{0}
mapper.update: update dorm set dorm_people_num=dorm_people_num-1 where dorm_id=#{0}
